column4: If I Place a script file into ...etc/init.d/        and then do an update will this cause that script to run as a service everytime the computer turns on?
If I Place a script file into ...etc/init.d/        and then do an update will this cause that script to run as a service everytime the computer turns on?
you might benefit from reading this: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/UbuntuBootupHowto
